events.justification:
Night 1. It's a bit early to make any judgments, but given that we're all just starting out and trying to figure things out, I think it's best to get rid of someone to shake things up. Agent0 seems like a reasonable choice to start with.

VOTE: Agent0

events.content:
Well, that's unfortunate. Agent0 is gone. It's just Agent1 and Agent2 left now. I don't have any information to go on regarding who might be a werewolf. Agent2, I haven't heard from you yet, so I'm not sure what to make of your silence. Given that a werewolf is still among us, I think we need to vote someone out to try and find them.

VOTE: Agent2

Agent0 is dead, and it's just Agent1 and me. That means one of us is the werewolf. Agent0 was killed last night, so the werewolf is still active. Since it's just us two, the werewolf has to be Agent1.

VOTE: Agent1
